Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement complete frontend UI for GPT-5 Mobile Assistant

## Frontend Implementation

### Theme System
- Created color palette, spacing, and typography systems
- Consistent design tokens across the application

### Common Components
- Button: Multi-variant button (primary, secondary, outline, text)
- Input: Text input with label, error handling, and password visibility toggle

### Authentication Screens
- LoginScreen: User login with Basic Auth
- RegisterScreen: New user registration with validation

### Chat Components
- MessageBubble: Displays user/assistant messages with citations and metadata
- ChatInput: Message input with send button
- ChatScreen: Main chat interface with streaming support

### Conversations
- ConversationsScreen: List view of all conversations with create/delete actions

### Navigation
- AuthNavigator: Auth flow (Login/Register)
- MainNavigator: Authenticated flow (Chat/Conversations)
- RootNavigator: Root-level navigation with auth state management

### Configuration
- App.tsx: Main app entry point with Redux Provider and PersistGate
- Environment configuration (.env) for API base URL
- Fixed syntax errors in API files

### Dependencies
- Installed all required npm packages (1028 packages)
- Resolved peer dependency conflicts with --legacy-peer-deps
